login.title: Welcome Back
login.subtitle: Sign in to your lottery account

register.title: Join the Lottery
register.subtitle: Create your account and start winning
register.roleDescription: Choose your account type. Users can participate in games, Vendors can create and manage games.

hero.title: Win Your Dream Products
hero.subtitle: Join thousands of winners who have transformed their lives with life-changing jackpots

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Follow these simple steps to start your journey towards winning life-changing prizes

description.dark: Experience the thrill of winning with our simple 4-step process designed for maximum excitement and rewards.
description.light: Follow these simple steps to start your journey towards winning life-changing prizes with our secure lottery platform.

step1.title: Choose Products
step1.description: Browse our amazing collection of tech, fashion, sneakers, and home appliances from top brands

step2.title: Play to Win
step2.description: Enter contests for your favorite products - iPhone 15 Pro Max, Nike Air Jordan, MacBook Pro and more

step3.title: Await Results
step3.description: Watch live drawings and see if you win your dream products from our premium catalog

step4.title: Get Delivered
step4.description: Winners receive authentic products delivered straight to their door - no cash substitutes

products.title: Win Your Dream Products
products.subtitle: Choose from our incredible product catalog featuring the latest tech, premium fashion, and top home appliances.
products.bottomCta: Ready to change your life? Join thousands of winners today!

winners.title: Recent Winners
winners.subtitle: Celebrate with our latest jackpot winners from around the world who have changed their lives forever
winners.description: Join our community of winners who have received incredible products from top brands like Apple, Nike, Samsung, and more.

footer.description: Transform your dreams into reality with our innovative lottery platform. Join thousands of winners who have changed their lives forever.

cta.title: Ready to Win Your Dream Products?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of winners who have received incredible products from Apple, Nike, Samsung, and top fashion brands. Your dream tech, fashion, or home appliance could be next!

dashboard.subtitle: Manage your lottery games, track participants, and grow your business.
dashboard.createGameDescription: Launch a new marketing lottery to promote your products and engage customers.
dashboard.viewGamesDescription: Browse all available lottery games and participate in exciting promotions.
dashboard.myTicketsDescription: View all your lottery tickets and track your participation history.

games.title: Available Games
games.subtitle: Discover exciting marketing lotteries and win amazing prizes. Join games with real-time participant tracking!
games.noGamesDescription: Try adjusting your search or filters, or check back later for new lottery games!
